title: Troll support should be report-able
body: Not only that but if someone troll supports they should be temporary banned from the game for like 1-2 days. Its becoming too common.

replies.body: I am a support main, and my go to supports are Swain, Nidalee, and Gangplank.

> [{quoted}](name=SSmotzer,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=B8UwgQWW,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-03-15T01:31:21.479+0000)
>
> I am a support main, and my go to supports are Swain, Nidalee, and Gangplank.

How does that even work.

Well, Swain's root is an aoe root, into a pull, and if my marksmen has any kind of displacement, like Vayne, then I can proc my pull off of them. The long range eye thing is great for keeping the enemies from recalling, and picking off back line healers. Then Rylies+Font of Life+Ardent gives my entire team a powerful engage with my ultimate.

Nidalee has a powerful lvl 1 poke with her Q and her max lvl heal can nearly full heal any champion in the game. And Rylies works with the traps for little slows.

With Gangplank I take klepto, and I just Q everything for money, wards, pots. Then I get gauntlet for some better cc. He is really a win early or die kinda support. Although late game he is basically invincible with an hourglass and visage, so there is still hope.

meh... nidalee USED to be a great support, until i think 5.5? or so

when they removed the % hp on her traps and make them worthless for anything except vision.
her heals doesn't heal as much now, her spears do less, traps are at least invisible now but, still do no damage.
nid support is pretty trash nowadays.

i LOVED playing it in season 3 and 4, but... its not really worth it, you cant peel for your adc, and with damage how it is now that make makes her not good in the support role
thats not troll supporting. Troll supporting is when you go mid lane to farm or top lane to just be annoying, or build a {{item:3068}} as a tank support
To be fair. I play only damage supports and some more off meta (vlad/swain) and people say I am trolling. No bud, you're just a trash ADC.

In theory, "troll" supports don't exsist. Off Meta supports exsist, but not troll supports. That's because all champions can generally be played in the support role. The most common off meta support that seems like a troll is Teemo. However Teemo, is actually extremely useful with his poke. So no, your suggestion is quite unfair to those who wish to try something new. 2ndly, this would mean that everytime a support picked a support that their AD or their teammates didn't want, they now could get banned.

It's not about the champion. It's about the play style.  When you pick Nami and go top lane that's trolling. When you pick LeBlanc and you land some snares that's now. When you pick Janna and you decide to run around all game that's trolling.  When you pick terms with glacial augment with font of life your a boss.
Nami top lane isn't troll. If they're inting and building like full movement speed, then yeah, its trolling, but if they are genuinely trying to win, it's not trolling, it's trying something new.

Picking an ADC that I don’t like or that I think isn’t good should be reportable. People picking bad ADCs that aren’t in the meta is becoming too common. 

See my point?
You don't auto fill into adc
Define “Troll support” or give champion examples

You can report someone for trolling, but a picking an odd champion just isn't considered trolling. 

Gotta get specific - did they afk or feed? That's reportable.
